improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error. Add check to ensure y is not zero before division.

The variable y is assigned the value 0 in the if block, but the final calculation z = x / y will cause an error.  It may be necessary to handle this case. Consider adding a check to ensure that y != 0 before dividing
Unnecessary assignment, y is always 4 after the loop.  This can be removed to improve code efficiency and readability.
The final value of y is always 4, which is printed by print(y).   The loop that reassigns y to 0 or 4 based on conditions is unnecessary in this case, since the final value of y is always 4.
